#summary The JCatapult Ant groovy plugin

= Introduction =

This plugin provides applications with the ability to compile Groovy source files into Java byte code .class files.

This plugin contains a single XML file that should be imported like this:

{{{
<import file="${ant.home}/plugins-jcatapult/groovy/1.0/compile.xml"/>
}}}

= Targets =

The plugin provides these targets:

== compile ==

Compiles the Groovy main and test source files into the _target/classes_ output directories.

== compile-main ==

Compiles the Groovy main source files into the _target/classes/main_ output directories.

== compile-test ==

Compiles the Groovy test source files into the _target/classes/test_ output directories.
